gcoe_projects_intro: Our GCOE members work on many different software projects, almost all of them are open source and will be listed here soon.

gcoe_projects.title: gearshifft
gcoe_projects.subtitle: Benchmark Suite for Heterogeneous Implementations of FFTs
gcoe_projects.description: This is a simple and easy extensible benchmark system to answer the question, which FFT library performs best under which conditions. Conditions are given by compute architecture, inplace or outplace as well as real or complex transforms, data precision, and so on.

gcoe_projects.title: PIConGPU
gcoe_projects.subtitle: A particle-in-cell code for GPGPUs
gcoe_projects.description: PIConGPU is a fully relativistic, many GPGPU, 3D3V particle-in-cell (PIC) code. The Particle-in-Cell algorithm is a central tool in plasma physics. It describes the dynamics of a plasma by computing the motion of electrons and ions in the plasma based on Maxwell's equations.
